biography.bio: Nikolay Karachentsov is one of the most popular Russian actors known for his intense dramatic roles. His mother was a ballet dancer. As a child Nikolai's favorite activity was reading - he read even by nights disguised under blanket with a flashlight. He became popular in 1974 after playing main character in "Til" drama at Lenkom theatre. He is well-known for his incredible will and ability to work 18-20 hours a day "I can't do my job another way", he says. His son Andrey is currently a student at the Institute of International Relationships in Moscow.
biography.name: Nikolay Karachentsov

biography.placeOfBirth: Karaganda, Kazakh SSR, USSR [now Qaraghandy, Kazakhstan]
biography.bio: Vladimir Steklov was born on January 3, 1948 in Karaganda, Kazakh SSR, USSR as Vladimir Aleksandrovich Steklov. He is an actor, known for Kadetstvo (2006), Bomzh (Bez opredelyonnogo mesta zhitelstva) (1988) and Kriminalnyy kvartet (1989).
biography.name: Vladimir Steklov

biography.placeOfBirth: Leningrad, Russian SFSR, USSR [now St. Petersburg, Russia]
biography.bio: Boris Shcherbakov was born on December 11, 1949 in Leningrad, Russian SFSR, USSR as Boris Vasilyevich Shcherbakov. He is an actor and anchorman. He is famous in Russia for his roles in movies, TV-series, and as an anchorman of a TV-show Good Morning on Chanel One Russia (2007-2014). Boris Shcherbakov also works a lot on stage. He worked at Moscow Art Theatre (founded by Stanislavsky) 1967-2003. Boris Shcherbakov has some state awards and decorations: 1) Honorary titles of People's Artist of Russian Federation and Meritorious Artist of Russia 2) The Order of Friendship 3) laureate of the State Prize of the Russian Federation 4) The Medal For Strengthening Military Cooperation. He has been married to actress and writer Tatyana Bronzova since 1973. They have one child.
biography.name: Boris Shcherbakov

biography.placeOfBirth: Muromtsevo, Muromtsevskiy rayon, Omskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR [now Russia]
biography.bio: Vladimir Eryomin was born on October 6, 1950 in Muromtsevo, Muromtsevskiy rayon, Omskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR as Vladimir Arkadevich Eryomin. He is an actor and producer, known for Pyatyy angel (2003), Love Is as Strong as Death (1997) and Prostranstvo dlya manyovra (1982).
biography.name: Vladimir Eryomin

biography.bio: Semyon Farada was born on December 31, 1933 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Semyon Lvovich Ferdman. He was an actor, known for Formula of Love (1984), Russkoe chudo (1994) and Ubit drakona (1989). He was married to Maria Politsejmako. He died on August 20, 2009 in Moscow, Russia.
biography.name: Semyon Farada

biography.placeOfBirth: Gelendzhik, North Caucasus Krai, RSFSR, USSR [now Krasnodar Krai, Russia]
biography.bio: Oleg Anofriev was born on July 20, 1930 in Gelendzhik, North Caucasus Krai, RSFSR, USSR as Oleg Andreevich Anofriev. He is an actor and director, known for The Bremen Town Musicians (1969), Kak lvyonok i cherepakha peli pesnyu (1974) and A Tale of Lost Times (1964).
biography.name: Oleg Anofriev

biography.bio: Aleksey Sheynin was born on December 18, 1947 in Leningrad, RSFSR, USSR as Aleksey Igorevich Sheynin. He is an actor, known for Melodii odnoy operetty (1978), Na uglu, u Patriarshikh 2 (2001) and Mademuazel Nitush (1974).
biography.name: Aleksey Sheynin

biography.bio: Yuriy Katin-Yartsev was born on July 23, 1921 in Moscow, Russia as Yuri Vasilyevich Katin-Yartsev. He was an actor, known for Rasputin (1981), The Very Same Munchhausen (1979) and Twenty Six Days from the Life of Dostoyevsky (1981). He died on March 18, 1994 in Moscow.
biography.name: Yuriy Katin-Yartsev

biography.bio: Nele Savicenko was born on December 1, 1957 in Vilnius, Lithuanian SSR, USSR. She is an actress, known for Summer (2015), Whisper of Sin (2007) and Non-Present Time (2014). She was previously married to Valentinas Klimas.
biography.name: Nele Savicenko

biography.bio: Ivan Muradkhanov is an actor, known for Kriminalnyy kvartet (1989), Doroga v ray (1993) and Gogol. Blizhayshiy (2011).
biography.name: Ivan Muradkhanov

biography.placeOfBirth: Alma-Ata, Kazakh SSR, USSR [now Almaty, Kazakhstan]
biography.bio: Lev Prygunov was born on April 23, 1939 in Alma-Ata, Kazakh SSR, USSR as Lev Georgiyevich Prygunov. He is an actor, known for The Saint (1997), The Sum of All Fears (2002) and K-19: The Widowmaker (2002).
biography.name: Lev Prygunov

biography.bio: Vadim Spiridonov was born on October 14, 1944 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR as Vadim Semyonovich Spiridonov. He was an actor, known for Batalyony prosyat ognya (1985), Vechnyy zov (1973) and Pervaya konnaya (1986). He died on December 10, 1989.
biography.name: Vadim Spiridonov

biography.placeOfBirth: Reinsfeld, Kuybyshev Oblast, RSFSR, USSR [now Zalesye, Samara Oblast, Russia]
biography.bio: Igor Yasulovich was born on September 24, 1941 in Reinsfeld, Kuybyshev Oblast, RSFSR, USSR as Igor Nikolayevich Yasulovich. He is an actor and director, known for Le bras de diamant (1969), Mio in the Land of Faraway (1987) and Wind Man (2007).
biography.name: Igor Yasulovich

biography.placeOfBirth: Novosibirsk, Zapadno-Sibirskiy kray, RSFSR, USSR [now Novosibirskaya oblast, Russia]
biography.bio: Yuriy Nazarov was born on May 5, 1937 in Novosibirsk, Zapadno-Sibirskiy kray, RSFSR, USSR as Yuriy Vladimirovich Nazarov. He is an actor, known for Andrei Rublev (1966), The Mirror (1975) and Little Vera (1988). He is married to Tatyana Nazarova. They have five children.
biography.name: Yuriy Nazarov

biography.bio: Boris Klyuev was born on July 13, 1944 in Moscow, USSR as Boris Vladimirovich Klyuyev. He is an actor, known for Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson: The Twentieth Century Approaches (1986), Voroniny (2009) and The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson: Mortal Fight (1980).
biography.name: Boris Klyuev
